## ValueOrArray type

A generic type which can be a single value or a recursive array of itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValueOrArray<T> = T | Array<ValueOrArray<T>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ValueOrArray](./ts-utils.valueorarray.md)
